name: Sacrosanctity
description:
(Beta Version 0.4)

What is Sacrosanctity?

Sacrosanctity is 3D wave survival game where you play as a mounted Elven commander. You must manage resources and units to assemble a mighty army capable of keeping the Orc hordes at bay.


Enemies:

Orc Grunt- Easy to deal with at first but becomes harder to manage as the horde grows each wave.

Orc Warrior- Be careful around this foe as they can absorb plenty of hits and can dish out the damage too.

Orc Commander - A fearless leader who will decimate your forces if not handled swiftly. As a commander he will order his troops to heal or attack, to maximise his chances of success. Luckily there can only be one commander at a given time.

Character customisation:

Choose a Stat boost (health, speed or attack damage)

Choose from a range of player colours

Choose how big or small you want to be

Infantry:

The backbone of your defences and critical to repelling enemies from the base whilst you're dealing with a threat elsewhere. As you buy more infantry you will push forward and reclaim what is rightfully yours.

Mines and workers:

Mining gold is essential to provide you with the resources to purchase infantry, defences and upgrades. There are 5 mines to fill out with workers to maximise your income.

Guide:

The wise advisor that will help you protect the base. Able to provide the following:

  • World context and story
  • Enemy lore
  • Change the difficulty
  • Upgrade units
  • Upgrade mines

Map:

Essential to keeping a track of the progress of your units whilst keeping an eye on invading forces. Also comes in handy as a navigational tool that will give you the advantage over the Orc horde.

Controls:

Arrow keys / WASD:     Move 

Shift:                                       Sprint  

Space:                                    Attack 

Mouse:                                 Navigate UI 

M:                                           Open Map 

Esc:                                        Pause game 

What's next?

  • Release on Steam when game is ready
  • New enemies (archer is in progress)
  • Enemy AI improvements (more complex behaviour)
  • Blockades to slow enemies down
  • More unit upgrades
  • More base upgrades
  • Player upgrades
  • New allies (heavy infantry and archers)
  • More potions that can be unlocked (Speed/attack boost)
  • More character customisation
